Omega Alumni Association

This site provides a basic information about Omega Alumini Association their aims and activities.

Apply for the membership Facebook Group Facebook Page Subscribe

About

Omega Alumni Association is an association of graduates or, more broadly, of former students (alumni) of Omega International College. It often organizes social events, publish newsletters or magazines, and raise funds for the organization. Omega Alumni provide a variety of benefits and services that help alumni maintain connections to the college and fellow graduates. Additionally, Association often support new alumni, and provide a forum to form new friendships and business relationships with people of similar backgrounds.
